list.headline: We noticed:​
list.text: Officials abuse copyright regulations to stop the spread of videos of possible misconduct.​

list.headline: We believe:​
list.text: Everybody should be able to share video evidence with the world. Unobstructed by content filter.

list.headline: We want to help:​​
list.text: We provide this simple tool. It processes video footage to reduce the risk of getting detected on upload.​
